description:
It's nice... but not as good as the original - which I did play and have - 386's and earlier?

When people bought computers as kits and soddered them together... Installed programs off a cassette tape etc.

This is too nit picky and finicky - and it's diverted far too far from the original...

You need to go back to basics and make it just like the original... 

And study the recordings of the original moon landing....
it is a simple but very fun game
